StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CheckIsValidO.cerReferrer]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ReferrerSource varchar(10), @ReferrerSSN varchar(9) ) AS BEGIN IF (@ReferrerSource = 'ERR') BEGIN SELECT MAX(M.MARINE_ID) FROM MARINE M INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ReferrerSSN END ELSE IF (@ReferrerSource = 'DEP') BEGIN SELECT MAX(C.CONTRACT_ID) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID AND P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ReferrerSSN) END ELSE IF (@ReferrerSource = 'REF') BEGIN SELECT MAX(M.MARINE_ID) FROM MARINE M INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (M.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID AND P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ReferrerSSN) END ELSE BEGIN SELECT 0 END
END
